title: Sawbones: Conversion Therapy Part 1
description:
This week, we're honoring Pride Month and the LGBTQ community with an exploration of the disturbing history of conversion therapy.

Trigger Warning: The treatments used in these "therapies" were upsetting, and those sensitive to hearing about them may wish to avoid this episode.

Music: "Medicines" by The Taxpayers
author: sawbones@maximumfun.org (Justin McElroy)
